name: Chocolate Peanut Butter Pancakes 🥗
description: Whip up a stack of these scrumptious Chocolate Peanut Butter Pancakes for a breakfast that'll make your taste buds dance! With a heavenly blend of chocolate and peanut butter, these fluffy flapjacks are perfect for a cozy morning treat.
instructions: In a bowl, mix the milk, egg, and peanut butter. Set aside.
In a separate bowl, combine flour, salt, and baking powder. Pour wet mixture into dry, add chocolate, and mix thoroughly.
Pour pancake batter in ¼ cup (60 ml) amounts on a griddle or skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook until bubbles pop on the surface of the pancake, then flip and cook the other side.
